We generally think Apple’s iPads are the best tablets for most people, but they don’t come cheap. To help those looking to grab one today get the most value possible, we’re keeping an eye on sale prices and rounding up the best iPad deals we can find each week.  
  
This week’s selection includes the return of a $100 price drop for the [iPad mini](https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=66ea567a-c987-4c2e-a2ff-02904efde6ea&itemId=amazon_B0DK3YF38G&siteId=us-engadget&pageId=1p-autolink&contentUuid=5c2b9c33-9a87-45ff-b978-e41b8f7a90a2&featureId=text-link&merchantName=Amazon&linkText=iPad+mini&custData=eyJzb3VyY2VOYW1lIjoiV2ViLURlc2t0b3AtVmVyaXpvbiIsImxhbmRpbmdVcmwiOiJodHRwczovL3d3dy5hbWF6b24uY29tL0FwcGxlLWlQYWQtTWluaS1BMTctUHJvL2RwL0IwREszWUYzOEc_&signature=AQAAARy8E4fd2iG6_nbtaK7tiV4Ja_4o-Q3EgUbSPqzLYKLx&gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.amazon.com%2FApple-iPad-Mini-A17-Pro%2Fdp%2FB0DK3YF38G), along with a $50 discount for the [entry-level iPad](https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=66ea567a-c987-4c2e-a2ff-02904efde6ea&itemId=amazon_B0DZ75TN5F&siteId=us-engadget&pageId=1p-autolink&contentUuid=5c2b9c33-9a87-45ff-b978-e41b8f7a90a2&featureId=text-link&merchantName=Amazon&linkText=entry-level+iPad&custData=eyJzb3VyY2VOYW1lIjoiV2ViLURlc2t0b3AtVmVyaXpvbiIsImxhbmRpbmdVcmwiOiJodHRwczovL3d3dy5hbWF6b24uY29tL2RwL0IwRFo3NVRONUYvcmVmPWZzX2FfaXB0Ml91czQ_&signature=AQAAAb7Jf3tA2ZcYi8ff5pgCFB5Ot_kh3uHbjd6iZdUoztY0&gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.amazon.com%2Fdp%2FB0DZ75TN5F%2Fref%3Dfs_a_ipt2_us4) and [early discounts](https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=66ea567a-c987-4c2e-a2ff-02904efde6ea&itemId=amazon_B0FWCXJVHN&siteId=us-engadget&pageId=1p-autolink&contentUuid=5c2b9c33-9a87-45ff-b978-e41b8f7a90a2&featureId=text-link&merchantName=Amazon&linkText=early+discounts&custData=eyJzb3VyY2VOYW1lIjoiV2ViLURlc2t0b3AtVmVyaXpvbiIsImxhbmRpbmdVcmwiOiJodHRwczovL3d3dy5hbWF6b24uY29tL2RwL0IwRldDWEpWSE4_dGFnPWdkZ3QwYy0yMCIsImNvbnRlbnRVdWlkIjoiNWMyYjljMzMtOWE4Ny00NWZmLWI5NzgtZTQxYjhmN2E5MGEyIiwib3JpZ2luYWxVcmwiOiJodHRwczovL3d3dy5hbWF6b24uY29tL2RwL0IwRldDWEpWSE4iLCJkeW5hbWljQ2VudHJhbFRyYWNraW5nSWQiOnRydWUsInNpdGVJZCI6InVzLWVuZ2FkZ2V0IiwicGFnZUlkIjoiMXAtYXV0b2xpbmsiLCJmZWF0dXJlSWQiOiJ0ZXh0LWxpbmsifQ&signature=AQAAAer2GyHmB0L1reG-bwDmnkKjM_Zfs-eZ-JFrhjR5VNDM&gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.amazon.com%2Fdp%2FB0FWCXJVHN) on the [recently updated](https://www.engadget.com/mobile/tablets/ipad-pro-m5-review-speed-boost-130046249.html) iPad Pro. Beyond tablets, the [MacBook Air](https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=66ea567a-c987-4c2e-a2ff-02904efde6ea&itemId=amazon_B0DZD9S5GC&siteId=us-engadget&pageId=1p-autolink&contentUuid=5c2b9c33-9a87-45ff-b978-e41b8f7a90a2&featureId=text-link&merchantName=Amazon&linkText=MacBook+Air&&signature=AQAAAcWgnfh3TqKMEwK0nIgaY8Hn4JFEBgwQnCJ0Dm6cRq9L&gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.amazon.com%2FApple-2025-MacBook-13-inch-Laptop%2Fdp%2FB0DZD9S5GC%2F), 3](https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=66ea567a-c987-4c2e-a2ff-02904efde6ea&itemId=amazon_B0FQFNRH72&siteId=us-engadget&pageId=1p-autolink&contentUuid=5c2b9c33-9a87-45ff-b978-e41b8f7a90a2&featureId=text-link&merchantName=Amazon&linkText=Apple+Watch+SE+3&custData=eyJzb3VyY2VOYW1lIjoiV2ViLURlc2t0b3AtVmVyaXpvbiIsImxhbmRpbmdVcmwiOiJodHRwczovL3d3dy5hbWF6b24uY29tL2RwL0IwRlFGTlJINzI_dGFnPWdkZ3QwYy0yMCIsImNvbnRlbnRVdWlkIjoiNWMyYjljMzMtOWE4Ny00NWZmLWI5NzgtZTQxYjhmN2E5MGEyIiwib3JpZ2luYWxVcmwiOiJodHRwczovL3d3dy5hbWF6b24uY29tL2RwL0IwRlFGTlJINzIiLCJkeW5hbWljQ2VudHJhbFRyYWNraW5nSWQiOnRydWUsInNpdGVJZCI6InVzLWVuZ2FkZ2V0IiwicGFnZUlkIjoiMXAtYXV0b2xpbmsiLCJmZWF0dXJlSWQiOiJ0ZXh0LWxpbmsifQ&signature=AQAAAV0vUECF0ER5dZCanJYnnvcif4hcSQpSgcDQ074wImxI&gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.amazon.com%2Fdp%2FB0FQFNRH72) and [Apple Watch Ultra 3](https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=66ea567a-c987-4c2e-a2ff-02904efde6ea&itemId=amazon_B0FQFHVZYL&siteId=us-engadget&pageId=1p-autolink&contentUuid=5c2b9c33-9a87-45ff-b978-e41b8f7a90a2&featureId=text-link&merchantName=Amazon&linkText=Apple+Watch+Ultra+3&&signature=AQAAAcWiaIb_6srSdAEk3Nyvf5k4jEZAIi4dOTA7mGgAPTMF&gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.amazon.com%2Fdp%2FB0FQFHVZYL%2F) is also steeply discounted at $65. It’s worth remembering that official Black Friday sales are just around the corner, so we expect to see more deals in the days and weeks ahead. But if you can’t hold out a little longer, here are all the top deals on Apple gear that we could find this week.

## Best iPad deals

[**Apple iPad (A16) for $299 ($50 off)**](https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=66ea567a-c987-4c2e-a2ff-02904efde6ea&itemId=amazon_B0DZ75TN5F&siteId=us-engadget&pageId=1p-autolink&contentUuid=5c2b9c33-9a87-45ff-b978-e41b8f7a90a2&featureId=text-link&merchantName=Amazon&linkText=Apple+iPad+%28A16%29+for+%24299+%28%2450+off%29&&signature=AQAAAdqDGd7d3-J1rfcuLdb8iUHDWsW5Ppej54e97PZqxUFP&gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.amazon.com%2FApple-iPad-11-inch-Display-All-Day%2Fdp%2FB0DZ75TN5F): The entry-level iPad comes with a faster A16 chip, 2GB more RAM and 128GB of storage by default. It earned a score of [84 in our review](https://www.engadget.com/mobile/tablets/ipad-2025-with-a16-review-no-apple-intelligence-no-problem-132641539.html) — if you only need a tablet for roaming the internet, watching shows and doing some lighter productivity tasks, it should do the job. With the new iPadOS 26 update, it also has most of the same multitasking features available with the more expensive models. We've seen this price for much of the past several months — it's $20 above the tablet's all-time low, but it's still a bit cheaper than buying direct from Apple. Also at [Walmart](https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=3719d8d4-5edd-4817-998a-91f3229e7323&itemId=walmart_transaction_15483805722&siteId=us-engadget&pageId=1p-autolink&contentUuid=5c2b9c33-9a87-45ff-b978-e41b8f7a90a2&featureId=text-link&merchantName=Walmart&linkText=Walmart&&signature=AQAAAYXlaZe2CqR0oFkgijXJ4fCTlf1EQx4d2dcfRsYnX7YS&gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.walmart.com%2Fip%2F2025-Apple-11-inch-iPad-A16-Built-for-Apple-Intelligence-Wi-Fi-128GB-Silver%2F15483805722), [Best Buy](https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=5e0bed65-d2f8-4b34-9b8f-955218c0e37a&siteId=us-engadget&pageId=1p-autolink&contentUuid=5c2b9c33-9a87-45ff-b978-e41b8f7a90a2&featureId=text-link&merchantName=Best+Buy&linkText=Best+Buy&&signature=AQAAAb1BbCK9a3EyTDSuoPA4ls2D7wlIhh_iYvdqKk6UrxCF&gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.bestbuy.com%2Fproduct%2Fapple-11-inch-ipad-a16-chip-with-wi-fi-128gb-blue%2FJJGCQG36LS%2Fsku%2F6578268) and [Target](https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=827d7835-78d6-4491-ae04-c042cab1d6e7&itemId=impact_radius_2092-85966318&siteId=us-engadget&pageId=1p-autolink&contentUuid=5c2b9c33-9a87-45ff-b978-e41b8f7a90a2&featureId=text-link&merchantName=Target&linkText=Target&&signature=AQAAAX5BxLIryL9GbDrktvbazT33SKLJNhC8yfsHm34sv-QJ&gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.target.com%2Fp%2Fapple-ipad-a16-10-9-inch-wi-fi-128gb-2025-11th-generation-blue%2F-%2FA-85966318).

[**Apple iPad Pro (11-inch, M5) for $945 ($54 off)**](https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=66ea567a-c987-4c2e-a2ff-02904efde6ea&itemId=amazon_B0FWCXJVHN&siteId=us-engadget&pageId=1p-autolink&contentUuid=5c2b9c33-9a87-45ff-b978-e41b8f7a90a2&featureId=text-link&merchantName=Amazon&linkText=Apple+iPad+Pro+%2811-inch%2C+M5%29+for+%24945+%28%2454+off%29&&signature=AQAAAYNuu8UQw-sSg9PnT9XZaV6GzW8p_uCRgjpa-Qu3yLMz&gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.amazon.com%2Fdp%2FB0FWCXJVHN%2F): Apple's [newest iPad](https://www.engadget.com/mobile/tablets/apples-latest-ipad-pro-get-a-power-boost-with-the-new-m5-chip-131036435.html) only came out less than a month ago, but it's already $50 or so off at various retailers. At Amazon, the base model with an M5 chip and 256GB of storage is down to a slightly less pricey $945. We gave this iPad Pro a score of [85 in our review](https://www.engadget.com/mobile/tablets/ipad-pro-m5-review-speed-boost-130046249.html). It has a class-leading OLED display and an impressively thin design, while the new M5 chip is more than powerful enough to do just about anything you'd want to do with an iPad. It's the only Apple tablet to support fast charging, too. That said, it's still far more iPad than casual buyers ever need, so it's best suited for hardcore iPad users and those with cash to burn. Also at [Best Buy](https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=5e0bed65-d2f8-4b34-9b8f-955218c0e37a&siteId=us-engadget&pageId=1p-autolink&contentUuid=5c2b9c33-9a87-45ff-b978-e41b8f7a90a2&featureId=text-link&merchantName=Best+Buy&linkText=Best+Buy&&signature=AQAAAdpPoTy7D250kiW0nsEn-YZbMe_VsQH_RvqFjJUo2nFQ&gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.bestbuy.com%2Fproduct%2Fapple-11-inch-ipad-pro-m5-chip-wi-fi-256gb-with-oled-space-black%2FJJGCQL7GHK) and [B&H](https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=95276f3c-7b79-4c1e-803f-981cd9f7a968&siteId=us-engadget&pageId=1p-autolink&contentUuid=5c2b9c33-9a87-45ff-b978-e41b8f7a90a2&featureId=text-link&merchantName=B%26H+Photo&linkText=B%26H&&signature=AQAAAb27ccvltxHtnFDn6_ZFx951SWxM-6W1Zk_wDddVSiD0&gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.bhphotovideo.com%2Fc%2Fproduct%2F1925491-REG%2Fapple_mdwl4ll_a_11_ipad_pro_m5.html) for $949.

[**Apple iPad Pro (13-inch, M5) for $1,247 ($52 off)**](https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=66ea567a-c987-4c2e-a2ff-02904efde6ea&itemId=amazon_B0FWD1MS82&siteId=us-engadget&pageId=1p-autolink&contentUuid=5c2b9c33-9a87-45ff-b978-e41b8f7a90a2&featureId=text-link&merchantName=Amazon&linkText=Apple+iPad+Pro+%2813-inch%2C+M5%29+for+%241%2C247+%28%2452+off%29&custData=eyJzb3VyY2VOYW1lIjoiV2ViLURlc2t0b3AtVmVyaXpvbiIsImxhbmRpbmdVcmwiOiJodHRwczovL3d3dy5hbWF6b24uY29tL2RwL0IwRldEMU1TODI_dGFnPWdkZ3QwYy0yMCIsImNvbnRlbnRVdWlkIjoiNWMyYjljMzMtOWE4Ny00NWZmLWI5NzgtZTQxYjhmN2E5MGEyIiwib3JpZ2luYWxVcmwiOiJodHRwczovL3d3dy5hbWF6b24uY29tL2RwL0IwRldEMU1TODIiLCJkeW5hbWljQ2VudHJhbFRyYWNraW5nSWQiOnRydWUsInNpdGVJZCI6InVzLWVuZ2FkZ2V0IiwicGFnZUlkIjoiMXAtYXV0b2xpbmsiLCJmZWF0dXJlSWQiOiJ0ZXh0LWxpbmsifQ&signature=AQAAAZYYDPIL3E1XFqDPT1h1xoPJUz82jx7oTCME55WRTKsA&gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.amazon.com%2Fdp%2FB0FWD1MS82): The 13-inch iPad Pro is virtually the same as the 11-inch version, only it's bigger. It's also more expensive, but the extra screen space might be worth it if you're committed to using the Pro as your main computer. Amazon isn't listing this as a discount, but rest assured it's still about $50 off Apple's MSRP. Again, given that these tablets were just launched, any sort of price drop is worth noting. Also at [Best Buy](https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=5e0bed65-d2f8-4b34-9b8f-955218c0e37a&siteId=us-engadget&pageId=1p-autolink&contentUuid=5c2b9c33-9a87-45ff-b978-e41b8f7a90a2&featureId=text-link&merchantName=Best+Buy&linkText=Best+Buy&&signature=AQAAAcusiLf7yaP9DG6VNloCrpaBRF0m7qtSI8MJ9G7yU7Ua&gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.bestbuy.com%2Fproduct%2Fapple-13-inch-ipad-pro-m5-chip-wi-fi-256gb-with-oled-space-black%2FJJGCQL7SFQ%2Fsku%2F6586881) and [B&H](https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=95276f3c-7b79-4c1e-803f-981cd9f7a968&siteId=us-engadget&pageId=1p-autolink&contentUuid=5c2b9c33-9a87-45ff-b978-e41b8f7a90a2&featureId=text-link&merchantName=B%26H+Photo&linkText=B%26H&&signature=AQAAAbReDz69LI5Dp-DWecE-zW67UmbECALx4TJ0TN9YP9c1&gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.bhphotovideo.com%2Fc%2Fproduct%2F1925485-REG%2Fapple_mdyj4ll_a_apple_13_ipad_pro.html) for $1,249.

## Best Apple deals

[**Apple MacBook Air (13-inch, M4) for $750 ($250 off)**](https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=66ea567a-c987-4c2e-a2ff-02904efde6ea&itemId=amazon_B0DZD9S5GC&siteId=us-engadget&pageId=1p-autolink&contentUuid=5c2b9c33-9a87-45ff-b978-e41b8f7a90a2&featureId=text-link&merchantName=Amazon&linkText=Apple+MacBook+Air+%2813-inch%2C+M4%29+for+%24750+%28%24250+off%29&&signature=AQAAAcWgnfh3TqKMEwK0nIgaY8Hn4JFEBgwQnCJ0Dm6cRq9L&gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.amazon.com%2FApple-2025-MacBook-13-inch-Laptop%2Fdp%2FB0DZD9S5GC%2F): Apple's latest MacBook Air is the top pick in our guide to the [best laptops](https://www.engadget.com/computing/laptops/best-laptops-120008636.html), and it earned a score of 92 [in our review](https://www.engadget.com/computing/laptops/apple-macbook-air-m4-13-inch-and-15-inch-review-minimal-upgrades-at-a-much-better-price-130002570.html). It's not a major overhaul, but the design is still exceptionally thin, light and well-built, with long battery life and a top-notch keyboard and trackpad. Now it's a bit faster. (Though we'd still love more ports and a refresh rate higher than 60Hz.) This is a new all-time low for the base model with 16GB of RAM and a 256GB SSD, but higher-end configurations are also $250 off.

[**Apple MacBook Air (15-inch, M4) for $950 ($250 off)**](https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=66ea567a-c987-4c2e-a2ff-02904efde6ea&itemId=amazon_B0DZDBDCFH&siteId=us-engadget&pageId=1p-autolink&contentUuid=5c2b9c33-9a87-45ff-b978-e41b8f7a90a2&featureId=text-link&merchantName=Amazon&linkText=Apple+MacBook+Air+%2815-inch%2C+M4%29+for+%24950+%28%24250+off%29&&signature=AQAAASIX7ZuxC9z4TziKCriJ5p4ciHTWmCrprA3h2o1JrGGe&gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.amazon.com%2FApple-2025-MacBook-15-inch-Laptop%2Fdp%2FB0DZDBDCFH): The 15-inch MacBook Air is nearly identical to the smaller version; apart from its roomier display, it adds better speakers and a more spacious trackpad. This deal marks another all-time low, and other configs are similarly discounted. Also at [Walmart](https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=3719d8d4-5edd-4817-998a-91f3229e7323&itemId=walmart_transaction_15466151341&siteId=us-engadget&pageId=1p-autolink&contentUuid=5c2b9c33-9a87-45ff-b978-e41b8f7a90a2&featureId=text-link&merchantName=Walmart&linkText=Walmart&&signature=AQAAAYBdHVA5y_BzGEjET6YHmJjVV6kjAgWrVA_kUDV1FL5q&gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.walmart.com%2Fip%2FApple-15-inch-MacBook-Air-M4-w-10-core-CPU-and-10-core-GPU-256GB-SSD-Midnight-MW1L3LL-A-2025%2F15466151341).

[**Apple Watch SE 3 (40mm, GPS) for $199 ($50 off)**](https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=66ea567a-c987-4c2e-a2ff-02904efde6ea&itemId=amazon_B0FQFNRH72&siteId=us-engadget&pageId=1p-autolink&contentUuid=5c2b9c33-9a87-45ff-b978-e41b8f7a90a2&featureId=text-link&merchantName=Amazon&linkText=Apple+Watch+SE+3+%2840mm%2C+GPS%29+for+%24199+%28%2450+off%29&custData=eyJzb3VyY2VOYW1lIjoiV2ViLURlc2t0b3AtVmVyaXpvbiIsImxhbmRpbmdVcmwiOiJodHRwczovL3d3dy5hbWF6b24uY29tL2RwL0IwRlFGTlJINzI_dGFnPWdkZ3QwYy0yMCIsImNvbnRlbnRVdWlkIjoiNWMyYjljMzMtOWE4Ny00NWZmLWI5NzgtZTQxYjhmN2E5MGEyIiwib3JpZ2luYWxVcmwiOiJodHRwczovL3d3dy5hbWF6b24uY29tL2RwL0IwRlFGTlJINzIiLCJkeW5hbWljQ2VudHJhbFRyYWNraW5nSWQiOnRydWUsInNpdGVJZCI6InVzLWVuZ2FkZ2V0IiwicGFnZUlkIjoiMXAtYXV0b2xpbmsiLCJmZWF0dXJlSWQiOiJ0ZXh0LWxpbmsifQ&signature=AQAAAV0vUECF0ER5dZCanJYnnvcif4hcSQpSgcDQ074wImxI&gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.amazon.com%2Fdp%2FB0FQFNRH72): This is the first major discount we've seen for the third-gen version of Apple's entry-level smartwatch, which was released in September. The big upgrade here is the always-on display, which means you no longer have to wake the watch to check the time or your notifications. (This tech was previously limited to the more expensive Apple Watch models.) The watch now runs on the same S10 chip as its higher-end siblings as well, plus it still covers the essential health and fitness features. If you’re in the market for your first smartwatch, or if you only want a watch for step counting, sleep tracking and notifications, it's a strong value. Just note that this deal only applies to the Starlight finish as of this writing.

[**Apple Watch Series 10 (42mm, GPS) for $280 ($119 off)**](https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=66ea567a-c987-4c2e-a2ff-02904efde6ea&itemId=amazon_B0DGJ5KQL7&siteId=us-engadget&pageId=1p-autolink&contentUuid=5c2b9c33-9a87-45ff-b978-e41b8f7a90a2&featureId=text-link&merchantName=Amazon&linkText=Apple+Watch+Series+10+%2842mm%2C+GPS%29+for+%24280+%28%24119+off%29&&signature=AQAAATdRM48HphOh5zr5DLlw2MTjrZM8OU3rceWUJQp9STVd&gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.amazon.com%2Fgp%2Fproduct%2FB0DGJ5KQL7): As a general rule, most people should buy the newest version of whatever Apple product they want. That said, the [new Apple Watch Series 11](https://www.engadget.com/wearables/apple-watch-series-11-review-a-reliable-wearable-for-when-it-matters-most-120016945.html) is only a minor upgrade over the Series 10: The battery lasts a little longer, the glass is more scratch-resistant, the cellular model has 5G support and that’s about it. If you’re mostly worried about saving cash and still need the more advanced health features the SE lacks — such as an ECG app and hypertension alerts — this is the best discount we've seen for last year’s model.

[**Apple Watch Ultra 3 (49mm) for $700 ($100 off)**](https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=66ea567a-c987-4c2e-a2ff-02904efde6ea&itemId=amazon_B0FQFHVZYL&siteId=us-engadget&pageId=1p-autolink&contentUuid=5c2b9c33-9a87-45ff-b978-e41b8f7a90a2&featureId=text-link&merchantName=Amazon&linkText=Apple+Watch+Ultra+3+%2849mm%29+for+%24700+%28%24100+off%29&&signature=AQAAAcWiaIb_6srSdAEk3Nyvf5k4jEZAIi4dOTA7mGgAPTMF&gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.amazon.com%2Fdp%2FB0FQFHVZYL%2F): The Ultra 3 is a much more niche device than Apple's other wearables, aimed at serious athletes and adventurers more than the typical gym-goer. It's the biggest and most rugged Apple Watch, with the brightest display (up to 3,000 nits), longest battery life (up to 42 hours) and most advanced components. It also supports [satellite communications](https://www.engadget.com/wearables/apple-watch-ultra-3-a-closer-look-at-its-satellite-communications-tools-120012387.html). This discount doesn't make it cheap by any means, but it does represent a new low. 

[**Apple Mac mini (M4) for $499 ($100 off)**](https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=66ea567a-c987-4c2e-a2ff-02904efde6ea&itemId=amazon_B0DLBTPDCS&siteId=us-engadget&pageId=1p-autolink&contentUuid=5c2b9c33-9a87-45ff-b978-e41b8f7a90a2&featureId=text-link&merchantName=Amazon&linkText=Apple+Mac+mini+%28M4%29+for+%24499+%28%24100+off%29&&signature=AQAAAfKkivKvJwpJ82do_zepUZVBOYt76N4gNxFOPaCo_YPj&gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.amazon.com%2FApple-2024-Desktop-Computer-10%2525E2%252580%252591core%2Fdp%2FB0DLBTPDCS): The newest version of Apple’s tiny desktop PC has a smaller overall footprint, a faster M4 chip, 16GB of RAM as standard (finally), two front-facing USB-C ports, an extra Thunderbolt 4 port and the ability to drive three external displays. It doesn't have any USB-A ports, however. We gave the M4 Pro model a [review score of 90](https://www.engadget.com/computing/apple-mac-mini-review-m4-pro-2024-shockingly-small-incredibly-powerful-140042432.html). This deal is for the entry-level version with a base M4 chip, 16GB of RAM and a 256GB SSD — we’ve seen it fall as low as $469 before, but this is still a decent savings. Also at [Best Buy](https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=5e0bed65-d2f8-4b34-9b8f-955218c0e37a&siteId=us-engadget&pageId=1p-autolink&contentUuid=5c2b9c33-9a87-45ff-b978-e41b8f7a90a2&featureId=text-link&merchantName=Best+Buy&linkText=Best+Buy&&signature=AQAAAbjZnYQrGXigtC8tHqt3Lp2_egCVym3pa9Zb96Wg5JIK&gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.bestbuy.com%2Fproduct%2Fapple-mac-mini-desktop-latest-model-m4-chip-built-for-apple-intelligence-16gb-memory-256gb-ssd-silver%2FJJGCQXH2S4%2Fsku%2F6566918), [Walmart](https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=3719d8d4-5edd-4817-998a-91f3229e7323&itemId=walmart_transaction_13715211330&siteId=us-engadget&pageId=1p-autolink&contentUuid=5c2b9c33-9a87-45ff-b978-e41b8f7a90a2&featureId=text-link&merchantName=Walmart&linkText=Walmart&&signature=AQAAAc99HTo0i8GbOV8bin5_f-MO0ZiO5ffOaA0z_hrqLIZ-&gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.walmart.com%2Fip%2FApple-Mac-mini-Apple-M4-chip-with-10C-CPU-10C-GPU-256GB-SSD-16GB-Memory-MU9D3LL-A-Fall-2024%2F13715211330) and [B&H](https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=95276f3c-7b79-4c1e-803f-981cd9f7a968&siteId=us-engadget&pageId=1p-autolink&contentUuid=5c2b9c33-9a87-45ff-b978-e41b8f7a90a2&featureId=text-link&merchantName=B%26H+Photo&linkText=B%26H&&signature=AQAAAdl9L0dXPqF4F4gCJc2JAooGPZkg0kHtVr4SR8Ifsv18&gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.bhphotovideo.com%2Fc%2Fproduct%2F1859258-REG%2Fapple_mu9d3ll_a_mac_mini_m4_10c_10cgpu_16gb_256gb.html).

[**Apple Pencil Pro for $99 ($30 off)**](https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=66ea567a-c987-4c2e-a2ff-02904efde6ea&itemId=amazon_B0D3J71RM7&siteId=us-engadget&pageId=1p-autolink&contentUuid=5c2b9c33-9a87-45ff-b978-e41b8f7a90a2&featureId=text-link&merchantName=Amazon&linkText=Apple+Pencil+Pro+for+%2499+%28%2430+off%29&custData=eyJzb3VyY2VOYW1lIjoiV2ViLURlc2t0b3AtVmVyaXpvbiIsImxhbmRpbmdVcmwiOiJodHRwczovL3d3dy5hbWF6b24uY29tL0FwcGxlLVBlbmNpbC1Qcm8tUGl4ZWwtUGVyZmVjdC1JbmR1c3RyeS1MZWFkaW5nL2RwL0IwRDNKNzFSTTc_&signature=AQAAAbnDOd1Y-uXnxIaIklNd_CQKo0riUtVEgmjvMJi64Vqr&gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.amazon.com%2FApple-Pencil-Pro-Pixel-Perfect-Industry-Leading%2Fdp%2FB0D3J71RM7): The top-end option in Apple’s [confusing stylus lineup](https://www.engadget.com/the-apple-pencil-lineup-is-a-mess-so-heres-a-guide-to-which-one-you-should-buy-190040913.html), the Pencil Pro supports pressure sensitivity, wireless charging, tilt detection, haptic feedback and Apple’s [double tap and squeeze gestures](https://support.apple.com/en-lb/guide/ipad/ipadc55b6c7a/ipados), among other perks. It’s a lovely tool for more intricate sketching and note-taking, but the catch is that it’s [only compatible](https://support.apple.com/en-us/108937) with the M4 iPad Pro, M2 and M3 iPad Air and most recent iPad mini. We've seen this deal fairly often over the course of the year, but it's a fine discount compared to buying from Apple directly. Also at [Best Buy](https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=5e0bed65-d2f8-4b34-9b8f-955218c0e37a&siteId=us-engadget&pageId=1p-autolink&contentUuid=5c2b9c33-9a87-45ff-b978-e41b8f7a90a2&featureId=text-link&merchantName=Best+Buy&linkText=Best+Buy&&signature=AQAAAQ4cVBlzYb6IJzFqHjIRUGg91vtu6JEUKmA8wfGFTwoD&gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.bestbuy.com%2Fproduct%2Fapple-pencil-pro-white%2FJJGCQ35H4Q%2Fsku%2F6535042), [Walmart](https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=3719d8d4-5edd-4817-998a-91f3229e7323&itemId=walmart_transaction_5762417070&siteId=us-engadget&pageId=1p-autolink&contentUuid=5c2b9c33-9a87-45ff-b978-e41b8f7a90a2&featureId=text-link&merchantName=Walmart&linkText=Walmart&&signature=AQAAAe_36i0PF0MdvVOFdGsvv3kW4g-wFCi9ka0cgdebTsU8&gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.walmart.com%2Fip%2FApple-Pencil-Pro-Advanced-Tools-Pixel-Perfect-Precision-Tilt-Pressure-Sensitivity-Industry-Leading-Low-Latency-Note-Taking-Drawing-Art-Attaches-Charg%2F5762417070) and [Target](https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=827d7835-78d6-4491-ae04-c042cab1d6e7&itemId=impact_radius_2092-89564442&siteId=us-engadget&pageId=1p-autolink&contentUuid=5c2b9c33-9a87-45ff-b978-e41b8f7a90a2&featureId=text-link&merchantName=Target&linkText=Target&&signature=AQAAAVfB0ix7WfI3AUwSTyolGYPmVRnRuY8UkvSXIoR0edU0&gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.target.com%2Fp%2Fapple-pencil-pro%2F-%2FA-89564442).
